topic.title: XML External Entity is Ignored (error code 1001)

body.p: When the target of an XML external entity is on the local file system but not inside one of the frameworks folders or in the DITA-OT folder, shows a validation warning: The external entity &name; is ignored. (error code: 1001) and does not resolve the entity.
To solve the problem one can do one of the following:

ul.li: move the external entity in one of the framework folders or in the DITA-OT folder
configure the additional.frameworks.directories option to include the folder where the target of the entity is.
set the ignore.extenal.entities.outside.frameworks option to the boolean value false.
